description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nInnocence:
Enemies with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CURSED} take 10% more damage from this debuff for each time an enemy has taken {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CURSED} damage in the current battle. This trait does not stack.
name: Maiden Lace
